preferences.description:
Some processes are named differently than the app itself. This flag determines whether
the path of the process should be searched for the query, or only the process name.
preferences.label: Filtering should search process paths
preferences.name: shouldSearchInPaths
preferences.title: Filtering

preferences.description: Determines whether the pid of the process should be searched for the query, or only the process name.
preferences.label: Filtering should search process pid
preferences.name: shouldSearchInPid

preferences.description: Determines whether apps are listed before other results when filtering.
preferences.label: Prioritize apps when filtering
preferences.name: shouldPrioritizeAppsWhenFiltering

preferences.description: Determines whether processes are sorted by CPU or memory usage.
preferences.label: Sort processes by memory usage
preferences.name: sortByMem

preferences.description: Determines whether aggregate processes belong to the same app.
preferences.label: Aggregate apps
preferences.name: aggregateApps

preferences.description: Refresh duration in milliseconds. The minimum value is 1000ms and to disable auto-refresh, set it to 0.
preferences.label: Refresh Duration
preferences.name: refreshDuration
preferences.title: Refresh Duration
